backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Quick Bee Agency backend, defining all data types (User, Service, Project, Lead, CRM, Payments, etc.) and canister logic with access control, Stripe/Razorpay integrations, and HTTP outcalls.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old canister state to new state during upgrades, specifically adding default automation settings to existing IntegrationSettings records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (automation cards, payment flows, etc.) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated text file containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files for documentation and build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including background, foreground, sidebar, chart, and destructive color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Quick Bee Agency React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, QueryClient provider, Internet Identity auth, and a profile setup dialog for new users.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentials.ts: Defines hardcoded demo credentials for Admin, Manager, and Client roles and exports a validation function to match email/password pairs to a role.
frontend/src/auth/useSession.ts: React hook that manages user session state (email and role) using sessionStorage, providing saveSession and clearSession helpers.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: React hook that manages a shopping cart persisted in localStorage, supporting add, remove, update quantity, clear, and total calculation.
frontend/src/components/bootstrap/Bootst: Displays a connection/initialization error message with a retry button, rendering either inline (login context) or as a centered full-panel layout.
Gate component that shows a loading spinner, error/timeout panel, or renders children based on bootstrap state, using a watchdog hook for timeout detection.
Top-level layout component combining a background mesh image, SidebarNav, TopNav, and a scrollable main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Role-filtered sidebar navigation that renders menu items with icons, highlights the active route, and links to all major app sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing the app title, a notification bell with unread badge and popover list, and a user dropdown with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/leads/BulkAction: Toolbar displayed when leads are selected, providing buttons for bulk export, delete, status change, and clearing the selection.
frontend/src/components/leads/BulkStatus: Dialog that allows bulk-updating the status of multiple selected leads, iterating through each and reporting success/failure counts via toasts.
frontend/src/components/leads/EditPaymen: Dialog component for editing a payment link's URL and QR code, supporting QR generation via an external API or file upload, with save mutations for URL and QR code updates.
frontend/src/components/leads/PaymentLin: Dialog component that displays a generated payment link with copy, open, and QR code download actions, and provides access to the EditPaymentLinkDialog for modifications.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Dialog form for creating a new service with fields for name, description, category, three pricing tiers with features, general features, and visibility/settings, submitting via a createService mutation.
Confirmation dialog for deleting a service by name, invoking the deleteService mutation and calling an onSuccess callback upon completion.
Dialog form for editing an existing service's details, pricing tiers, features, and settings, pre-populated from the service prop and submitted via an updateService mutation.
Dialog for editing a service's payment URL and QR code, supporting QR generation from a URL via an external API or image file upload, saved via the updateServicePaymentInfo mutation.
Displays a payment information card showing a copyable payment link URL and/or a downloadable QR code image. Returns null if neither prop is provided.
A dialog component for configuring Razorpay payment settings (enable/disable, Key ID, Order ID) for a specific service, using the useUpdateServiceRazorpay mutation to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/settings/Razorpa: A settings panel card for entering and saving global Razorpay API credentials (key, secret, webhook secret) with a toggle to show/hide sensitive fields and a configured/not-configured status indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
A hook that sets a 5-second timeout flag to detect bootstrap/loading timeouts, with a reset function to restart the timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity, and status state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the ICP backend actor, covering entities such as users, services, projects, orders, leads, payments, and Razorpay configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a dark teal-themed design system, including utility classes for gradients and glass-panel effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/marketplace/servicesCatalog: Exports a static array of 30 default service offerings (e.g., Website Development, SEO Setup) with names and descriptions for use in the marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Static analytics dashboard page displaying four KPI cards for Revenue, Active Clients, Conversion Rate, and Top Service with hardcoded sample data.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationPage.tsx: Automation settings page that allows users to configure and toggle integrations such as WhatsApp replies, sequence builders, proposal auto-send, payment confirmation, and project onboarding, persisting settings via backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that lists cart items with quantity controls and removal options, and shows an order summary with GST calculation and a checkout link.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that supports Stripe and conditionally Razorpay payment methods, creates a checkout session via the backend, and redirects the user to complete payment.
A placeholder page for client onboarding that displays a card with a message indicating the onboarding form will appear after project creation.
frontend/src/pages/CRMPage.tsx: CRM pipeline page that fetches leads and activities from the backend and displays them in a Kanban-style grid organized by sales stage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that fetches and displays key metrics (total revenue, active projects, total orders) in stat cards with loading skeletons, using the authenticated user's profile and role.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of six rule-based business tool cards (e.g., proposal generator, pricing strategy) with icons and descriptions, with no interactive functionality yet.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Full-featured leads management page supporting create, edit, delete, bulk status changes, and payment link generation for leads, with filtering by micro-niche, channel, and status.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Displays a grid of required legal document cards (Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, etc.), showing content if available from the backend or a placeholder if not yet created.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that validates demo credentials, initiates Internet Identity authentication, and conditionally shows a profile setup form for new users to enter their name and business name.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Notifications page that lists unread and read notifications in tabs, supports marking as read, and navigates to relevant pages based on notification type.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Static payment failure page showing an error icon and message with links to return to the cart or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Displays a tabbed payments page showing Stripe orders and Razorpay payment links, with loading skeletons and an edit dialog for payment links.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success page that clears the cart on mount and displays a confirmation message with links to view projects or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx: Shows details for a single project fetched by ID from route params, displaying status and service ID in a card.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists all projects for the authenticated user in a responsive grid with service names, status badges, and start dates.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Renders a service's full detail view with three pricing tiers, add-to-cart functionality, and admin controls for editing, deleting, and configuring payment settings.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays the service marketplace with category and visibility filters, falling back to default services if none are loaded, with admin controls for creating services and managing payment info.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin-only settings page that renders the Razorpay configuration panel, showing an access-denied card for non-admins.
frontend/src/payments/useCreateCheckoutS: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to create a Stripe checkout session and returns the session ID and redirect URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, border radii, fonts, accordion animations, and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3), listing existing automation features (WhatsApp replies, sequence builder, proposal auto-send, payment confirmation, project onboarding) with their IDs, titles, and requirement references.
